column1: 146 new coronavirus deaths in England hospitals | Oxford Mail. #RIP

1. Seasonal flu is seasonal whereas Coronavirus is not so may keep growing and mutating
2. 0.05% of people who caught the flu have died from the virus in the U.S., according to CDC data. So Coronavirus is 4 times deadlier. 
3. 2% is one dead person on every bus

If a single case of Corona virus is transmitted due to your irresponsibility you should be ashamed. 

You could have used social media to the same effect. 

Climate control is important but so is preventing a pandemic.

Perhaps you logic is if 100,000,000 die it lowers carbon?
